categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: The Old Republic

nodes.text: The Phobis Core was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Phobis devices in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic; however, the entry was cut before the final release, leaving the entry's canon status uncertain. The Phobis devices have been referenced several times in later Codex entries on the Dread Masters, but the Core has never been specifically identified in an implemented Codex entry. This article includes only the information presented in the cut entry.
